document_data.caption: A map showing Horse Way in northwest Daggerford.
document_data.name: Horse Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Horse Way''' was a small road found in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: Horse Way originated in the northwest corner of Daggerford, beginning along [[Wall Street (Daggerford)|Wall Street]] and passing east until ending at [[Fields Lane]] at the [[Dragonback Inn]]. A small stretch of Horse Way branched north to connect with the northern arm of Wall Street as well.
document_data.Notable Locations:
Notable buildings located along Horse Way included:

* The [[Dragonback Inn]]
* [[Wayfel's Smithy]]
* [[Thieves' Brotherhood]]
